parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission slippage and internal failure can cause the vehicle to hesitate or fail to shift gears, leading to loss of power, reduced acceleration, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Transmission slips from one gear to another
error code indicates internal slippage
transmission hesitates or fails to shift
vehicle must be shifted back into reverse and then back to drive to engage gears
problems worsen in cold weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Corrosion and Failure of Transmission Dip Stick and Tube
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion and failure of the transmission dip stick and tube can lead to inaccurate transmission fluid level readings, causing premature wear on transmission components and potentially leading to transmission failure.
symptoms: Transmission dip stick and tube corroded
rusted
or broken
transmission fluid level readings inaccurate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Shift cable failure can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to difficulty shifting gears, hesitation, or failure to engage gears, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Shift cable failed
transmission difficult to shift
hesitation or failure to engage gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop, increasing the risk of accidents and potentially leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal requires excessive force to stop the vehicle
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the brake pedal goes all the way to the floorboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the speed sensor can cause issues with the vehicle's anti-lock braking system (ABS), traction control system (TCS), and electronic stability control (ESC), potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The speedometer or odometer is not functioning correctly
the ABS
TCS
or ESC warning lights are illuminated
the vehicle's performance is affected
the vehicle's safety features are compromised.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tread Separation and Steel Belt Failure in Firestone SteelTex R45 Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The tread separation and steel belt failure can cause sudden tire blowouts, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle starts shaking or vibrating prior to the blowout
the tire tread separates
the steel belt breaks
the tire blows out
and the vehicle may lose control or become unstable.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Manufacturing Defects
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to manufacturing defects can cause sudden tire blowouts, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The tire blows out suddenly
the vehicle starts shaking or vibrating prior to the blowout
the tire tread separates
the steel belt breaks
and the vehicle may lose control or become unstable.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Misalignment and Structural Integrity Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improperly welded doors can cause misalignment, leading to difficulties in opening and closing, and potentially causing the door to fall off while driving, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: Doors are difficult to open or close
doors are misaligned
doors are sagging or drooping
doors are starting to fall off
unusual noises or vibrations when opening or closing doors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive vibration of the exterior mirrors can obstruct the driver's view, potentially leading to accidents or near-misses due to reduced visibility.
symptoms: Exterior mirrors shake or vibrate vigorously while driving
obstructing the driver's view
especially at high speeds.
